title: GRM Overseas board okays fundraise of Rs 136.5 crore
description: The funds raised will also expand India's “10X” brand, making it a comprehensive food FMCG product company. The funds will also be allocated to explore future inorganic growth opportunities, including strategic mergers and acquisitions, and improve operational capabilities. These activities may be undertaken directly by the Company or through its subsidiaries or joint ventures.
